com.wbillingsley.tutorials.mock

Class DeadDrop

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wbillingsley.tutorials.mock.DeadDrop

  • public class DeadDrop
extends java.lang.Object
    A Ruritanian dead drop, that tries to synchronise data with spy phones.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      DeadDrop(Code code)

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • setVerifier

        public void setVerifier(Code v)

      • startSync

        public Verifier startSync(SpyPhone p,
                 Code code)
        Attempts to synchronise data with a phone. If the code is correct, the dead drop will synchronise. If it isn't, it won't. The dead drop returns a cryptographic verifier, allowing the spy phone to check it was talking to a real dead drop (though rumour has it that only the cautious British spy phones actually check this.)
